author: Paris Marx
title: Coronavirus reveals the truth about America's 'essential' worker caste system
description: Despite filling roles that are essential to modern life, many American workers remain in a separate, lesser class of employee even as their executives make millions.
content: Over the past decade, tech companies have become a driving force of U.S. economic power. And the COVID-19 shutdown has provided many of them with an opportunity to increase their share of consumer spending as many brick-and-mortar businesses are closed. Brian… [+7313 chars]
